subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Hynes, most recently the coach of the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins of the American Hockey League, was introduced as the Devils’ 17th head coach.
snippet: Hynes, most recently the coach of the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins of the American Hockey League, was introduced as the Devils’ 17th head coach.
